list.name: Changes
list.comment: [FIX] The test suite was run, failures were identified, and targeted fixes were applied to make indexes optional and correct dictionary behaviors. After implementing the fixes, the full test suite of 241 tests passed successfully. Guidance on running the tests with proper discovery was provided.

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: [WIP] transacciones anidadas, listas con head, tail y split optimo, factorización de acceso a los roots, manejo flexible de database y transacciones con bloques with

task.summary: [IMP] First implementation of performance analysis (Fully automated by Junie AI)
[FIX] additional files for new query features

[ADD] Implemented persistent internal secondary indexes for List, Dictionary, and Set, updating relevant methods and iterators to use these indexes. The new indexes.py module includes IndexDefinition and an immutable IndexRegistry, ensuring stable identifiers and lazy index loading. Completed testing confirmed proper functionality and index integrity.

[ADD] Range operators `between[]`, `between()`, `between(]`, and `between[)` were implemented with parsing, evaluation, and index-based optimization. All tests passed successfully, confirming correct functionality and backward compatibility. The solution is now ready for submission.

[ADD] Se implementó la optimización de la cláusula `where` con intersección progresiva de condiciones AND ordenadas por selectividad utilizando índices. Todas las pruebas objetivo fueron exitosas, aunque hubo un error con el descubrimiento completo por un módulo externo faltante. Sin índices, se conserva el filtrado linear habitual.

[ADD] The performance suite was updated to use new indexes, enabling a benchmark to evaluate proto_db with indexed collections against a Python baseline. A new benchmark script was created, executed successfully, and documentation was updated accordingly.

[ADD] The Sphinx documentation was successfully updated to reflect new features, including range operators, UnnestPlan, CollectionFieldPlan, index-aware WHERE optimizations, and the indexed benchmark. New pages were created and existing content modified as needed. All changes were documented and submitted for review.

[ADD] A new `Vector` type and an `ExactVectorIndex` interface with basic operators for similarity search were successfully implemented in `proto_db`. The `near[]` operator was integrated, allowing for linear fallback evaluations, and all tests passed successfully. Documentation was updated accordingly, leaving future enhancements like ANN and persistence for subsequent phases.

[ADD] HNSWVectorIndex was successfully implemented for handling vector fields in proto_db, including functionality for KNN and near[] queries, with fallback to ExactVectorIndex and support for incremental updates and persistent storage. All associated unit tests passed, and documentation was updated accordingly. No errors or issues were reported during the implementation phase.

[ADD] A vector ANN benchmark script was created to measure and compare the performance of HNSW against ExactVectorIndex and optional NumPy and scikit-learn baselines, successfully producing JSON output with timings. All existing tests remained unaffected and passed. No errors were encountered during execution, confirming the accuracy of the benchmarking tool.

[ADD] A vector ANN benchmark script was created to measure and compare the performance of HNSW against ExactVectorIndex and optional NumPy and scikit-learn baselines, successfully producing JSON output with timings. All existing tests remained unaffected and passed. No errors were encountered during execution, confirming the accuracy of the benchmarking tool.

[ADD] An IVF-Flat vector index backend (IVFFlatIndex) was implemented in `vector_index.py`, enabling copy-on-write updates without tombstones and multiprobe search. All unit tests passed, ensuring functionality and integration with existing vector features.

[ADD]IVF-Flat performance comparison has been integrated into the vector benchmark suite, enabling comparisons against Exact and HNSW indices. The updated benchmark includes IVF metrics and can be executed with specific parameters to generate detailed results.

[IMP] Performance measurement scripts for LINQ queries were added in the `examples/` directory, including `linq_performance.py`. The execution and results can now be saved to a JSON file, demonstrating the performance of LINQ operations over various data structures. All changes were successfully implemented without errors.

[IMP] Performance measurement scripts for LINQ queries were added in the `examples/` directory, including `linq_performance.py`. The execution and results can now be saved to a JSON file, demonstrating the performance of LINQ operations over various data structures. All changes were successfully implemented without errors.

[IMP] Performance measurement scripts for LINQ queries were added in the `examples/` directory, including `linq_performance.py`. The execution and results can now be saved to a JSON file, demonstrating the performance of LINQ operations over various data structures. All changes were successfully implemented without errors.

[IMP] Atom-level in-memory caches (AtomObjectCache and AtomBytesCache) were successfully implemented with a 2Q replacement policy, integrated into the atom read path, and tested. The implementation ensures high hit rates and improved read performance without introducing regressions or deadlocks. Metrics for cache efficiency are also exposed for monitoring.

[IMP] Implemented adaptive chunking and work-stealing for parallel scans as an optional feature without changing default behavior. Added configuration, metrics, graceful shutdown, and comprehensive tests ensuring correctness, performance, and backward compatibility. Provided new user documentation, API references, ADR, and a changelog entry.

[FIX] Translated commercial_positioning.md to professional English preserving structure and tone. Updated multiple sections with accurate English content and verified related unit tests passed. No code changes occurred, and repository integrity remained intact.

[FIX] The performance suite was rerun with updated benchmark results saved in JSON files. Unit tests for the parallel module passed without issues. Documentation remained accurate and no updates were needed.

[FIX] The performance suite was rerun with updated benchmark results saved in JSON files. Unit tests for the parallel module passed without issues. Documentation remained accurate and no updates were needed.

[FIX] queries.py: Fixed multiple errors in proto_db/queries.py related to IndexedQueryPlan and index handling. Corrected API usage, key normalization, bounds checking, and index-based query execution. Testing is currently blocked by a separate circular import issue unrelated to these fixes.

[FIX] The test suite was run, failures were identified, and targeted fixes were applied to make indexes optional and correct dictionary behaviors. After implementing the fixes, the full test suite of 241 tests passed successfully. Guidance on running the tests with proper discovery was provided.

[FIX] queries.py: Fixed multiple errors in proto_db/queries.py related to IndexedQueryPlan and index handling. Corrected API usage, key normalization, bounds checking, and index-based query execution. Testing is currently blocked by a separate circular import issue unrelated to these fixes.

[FIX] The test suite was run, failures were identified, and targeted fixes were applied to make indexes optional and correct dictionary behaviors. After implementing the fixes, the full test suite of 241 tests passed successfully. Guidance on running the tests with proper discovery was provided.
